mapper.sql: id, user_id, room_id, room_code, room_nick, room_owner, member_count, is_owner, small_head_url
mapper.select: select id from chat_rooms where room_id = '${room_id}' AND user_id = '${user_id}'
mapper.insert: insert into chat_rooms (id, user_id, room_id, room_code, room_nick, room_owner, member_count, is_owner, small_head_url, small_head) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isOwner,jdbcType=BIT}, #{smallHeadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallHead,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})

update chat_rooms
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
